entry_groups.name: 【TEKKEN TUESDAY】Tekken 8 Dragunov Reaction and 7 Online play【#Coyote / #KemoV】#tekken #鉄拳7
entry_groups.description:
Feel free to join us in sessions and tourney!
How to join sessions
1. Must type the password "awoo" in the ingame chat (so we know you are a viewer)
2. ONLY fight against me (coyo), and do not accept matches against viewers (this is so I can fight everyone in session and have time for tourney later)
3. 1 match per person - * after you finish your match with me, please leave the session lobby. (this is so others can find the lobby and more slots open up for others to join in too)
4. In sessions, internet connection does not matter. Just come to have fun - we can accept lag for our casual sessions!

How to join Tourneys:
1. Must type the password "awoo" in the ingame chat (so we know you are a viewer)
2. First come, first serve basis
3. We may have special tourneys with rules and will explain it before the tourney starts (sometimes we do random character selection tourneys, P2 side only tourneys, Leo only tourneys, etc)
4. We do take internet connection into account for tourneys. It will depend on your connection with me (coyo).

▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△
Opening screen Illustrator/animator: ツクウルフル様 (@kemopuffin)
▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△▼△
Hello Coyo! おはコヨー！It’s Coyo here!

I am a Coyote from Japari Park and it is a pleasure to meet everyone from around the world! My main language is English, and sometimes I speak in Japanese. Other languages are also welcomed in chat but I’m sorry if I am unable to understand - I am still studying multiple languages and hope to understand more in the future! I am looking forward to spending time with everyone!~🐾🐾🐾🐾

entry_groups.name: 【TEKKEN TUESDAY】Tekken 8 Shaheen Reaction and 7 Online play【#Coyote / #KemoV】#tekken #鉄拳7
entry_groups.description:
Feel free to join us in sessions and tourney!
How to join sessions
1. Must type the password "awoo" in the ingame chat (so we know you are a viewer)
2. ONLY fight against me (coyo), and do not accept matches against viewers (this is so I can fight everyone in session and have time for tourney later)
3. 1 match per person - * after you finish your match with me, please leave the session lobby. (this is so others can find the lobby and more slots open up for others to join in too)
4. In sessions, internet connection does not matter. Just come to have fun - we can accept lag for our casual sessions!

How to join Tourneys:
1. Must type the password "awoo" in the ingame chat (so we know you are a viewer)
2. First come, first serve basis
3. We may have special tourneys with rules and will explain it before the tourney starts (sometimes we do random character selection tourneys, P2 side only tourneys, Leo only tourneys, etc)
4. We do take internet connection into account for tourneys. It will depend on your connection with me (coyo).
